short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that removes distracting features from Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DISCLAIMER: THIS IS NOT ASSOCIATED WITH INSTAGRAM OR META IN ANY WAY

Removes distracting features from Instagram in the web browser such as:
- Suggested posts
- Explore button
- Reels button
- Stories
- Suggested profiles

Any feedback is welcome and I'm committed to adding any desired features.
